home.welcome: I’m a student who’s into technology and computer science. I like building websites and digital projects. I enjoy figuring out how systems function and improving them over time through problem-solving and iteration.

highlights.title: Clean Design
highlights.text: I focus on layouts that are simple, organized, and easy to use.

highlights.title: Creative Problem-Solving
highlights.text: I enjoy debugging code and finding smarter ways to make things work.

highlights.title: Growing Skills
highlights.text: Every project helps me improve my coding, design, and critical thinking skills.

about.intro: Technology interests me because it’s always evolving and there’s always something new to learn. I like how computer science combines logic and creativity — you can build real tools from just ideas and code.
about.focus: Right now, I’m improving my HTML, CSS, and programming skills while writing cleaner code and organizing projects better.

portfolio.intro: This page tracks my projects and shows how my skills improve over time.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Built a multi-page HTML website to showcase my projects, interests, and reflections.
projects.reflection: I learned how to structure pages properly and organize content using semantic HTML.

projects.title: Stock Market Predictor Prototype
projects.description: Created a basic app that uses historical data to estimate stock price trends and display them on a graph.
projects.reflection: I learned about working with data, training models, and the importance of testing predictions.

reflection.intro: Reflection helps me understand what I’m improving at and what still needs work.
reflection.skills: I track teamwork, communication, organization, and problem-solving.

entries.title: Personal Portfolio Website
entries.learned: I learned how to structure a full website and keep the design consistent.
entries.wentWell: The layout was clean and easy to navigate.
entries.challenging: Making everything responsive and fixing small layout bugs.
